# DEPENDENCIES: USD/EGP exchange rates from World Bank; export data from SelinaWamucii/Volza

column1: # DATA_QUALITY: High. Export price trends (2017-2024) well-documented. Recent wholesale 9.50 EGP/kg (Apr 2025) verified. 2015 peak export year provides baseline.
# COMPARISON_TO_TOY: Research prices slightly lower than toy. Toy range $0.39-$0.62/kg; research range $0.30-$0.55/kg wholesale. Egyptian onions competitively priced for export due to scale.
